EmailTemplate.subject: Win 2 Passes to VMworld 2014 | Paint the Town Green | August 24-28, 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Enter to Win Tickets to VMworld: http://bit.ly/1krN3vc
Enter to Win 2 Full Passes to VMworld 2014 {{lead.First Name:default=}}:
Every Friday until June 27th, VMTurbo is giving away two Full Conference Passes to VMworld 2014 in San Francisco. The epicenter of all things virtual, VMworld is our industry's biggest stage. We will be there, and we want you there too. Enter to win today, and let's Paint the Town Green. Enter to Win <http://bit.ly/1krN3vc> 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
